content.title: Deck Discipline
content.setup:
{CAPTAIN_NAME} runs a tight ship. That's your job — making sure the crew follows orders.

Someone slacked on the night watch. Everyone knows who. Now they're watching to see what you do.

options.text: Public discipline — make an example
Private warning — give them one chance
Extra duty — punishment through work
Ignore it — not worth the trouble
options.outcome: You do it, knowing it will have consequences.

content.title: Rigging Emergency
content.setup:
Line snapped in the wind. The sail's loose, the mast is groaning, and {SHIP_NAME} is fighting the storm.

"Boatswain! Get that rigging fixed!"

options.text: Lead the crew up yourself
options.outcome: You take the risk and see it through.

options.text: Direct from deck, guide the sailors
Send the most experienced sailor up
Cut the line, lose the sail, save the mast

content.title: Supply Rationing
content.setup:
{DAYS_AT_SEA} days out. Food's running low. Water's worse.

{CAPTAIN_NAME} wants strict rationing. The crew won't like it.

options.text: Implement fair rationing, explain why
Short the rations quietly, don't announce
options.outcome: You take the risk and see it through.

options.text: Catch fish to supplement
Officers eat full, crew gets cut
options.outcome: You do it, knowing it will have consequences.

content.title: Man Overboard
content.setup:
"Man overboard!"

The cry goes up. Someone's in the water. The ship's moving fast. The sea is cold.

options.text: Organize immediate rescue
Jump in yourself
options.outcome: You take the risk and see it through.

options.text: Throw the line, guide from deck
He's gone — don't risk more lives

content.title: Crew Dispute
content.setup:
Two sailors at each other's throats. Something about stolen rations, a woman back home, some old grudge. Doesn't matter — it's spreading.

The crew's watching you.

options.text: Separate them, hear both sides
Let them fight it out (controlled)
options.outcome: You take the risk and see it through.

options.text: Punish both — no fighting aboard
Take sides with the senior man
options.outcome: You do it, knowing it will have consequences.
